tasks.title: GET JSON (Java 11)
tasks.code:
import java.net.http.*; import java.net.URI
fun main(){ val c = HttpClient.newHttpClient(); val r = c.send(HttpRequest.newBuilder(URI("https://httpbin.org/json")).build(), HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString()); println(r.body()); }
